name: Numerikabrak #2
description:
Video game "Cadavre exquis", created by the visitors of @NumerikGames 2019 festival in Yverdon-les-bains (CH). They draw us a lot of assets and we had to assemble them into some video game. This game is the raw result of this experience :D

Thanks to everybody who participated!

HOW TO PLAY: Arrow keys to move around,

COMMENT JOUER: Touches fléchées pour se déplacer.

Who is responsible for assembling all those awesome sweet artworks?

the Devs: Maurizio Rigamonti, Dan Bourquin

the Photoshoppers: Pauline Rossel, Wuthrer

NumerikGames official website, Swissgame Center
